column5: This beautiful 3 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms is perfectly located in S. College Station just 10 minutes from Kyle Field and Texas A&M University. This home has just been repainted entirely and has had new flooring installed. Master bedroom has a queen size bed and plenty of room if you wish to bring an air mattress. The queen guest room has it's own private full bathroom. Kitchen has just had brand new appliances installed. Sleeps 6-10 people.
